<h2 id=help>Debugger (GUI)</h2>

The Jsi debugger Gui user interface runs in a web browser
(this requires Jsi be built with [./js-websocket.wiki]).

    <nowiki><pre class=verbatim>
<b>jsish DebugUI.zip </b> simple.jsi
</pre></nowiki>

The DebugUI is the same as Jsi)Debug, but adds Gui features such as 
double-clicking to set breakpoints.
